nodes.text: These freighters were used by Naboo pilots around the time of the Invasion of Naboo.

The freighters were commonplace in the hyperlanes around Naboo around 32 BBY, frequently operating in convoys. The father of Royal Naboo Security Forces pilot Rhys Dallows owned one of these freighters and used it at the time of his disappearance.
The freighter Mercatan went on to join forces with Dallows during a rescue mission against the Trade Federation.
This type of freighter only appeared in the video game Star Wars: Starfighter.
